<title level="1" right="Trait">[Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 282 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

When you hit a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature, this weapon deals 1 precision damage in addition to its normal damage. The precision damage increases to 2 if the weapon is a _+3 weapon_.
name: Backstabber
